title: glibc error while importing torch
body_html:
Install PyTorch following the instructions: http://pytorch.org/
It gives the error message when I import torch:

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "", line 1, in
File "XXX/anaconda3/envs/XXX/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/init.py", line 56, in
from torch._C import *
ImportError: /lib64/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.17' not found (required by XXX/anaconda3/envs/XXX/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so)

  • PyTorch
  • OS: CentOS release 6.7 (Final)
  • PyTorch version: 3.0.1
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): conda
  • Python version: 3.6
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 8.0/6.0

body:
Install PyTorch following the instructions: http://pytorch.org/ 
It gives the error message when I import torch:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
  File "XXX/anaconda3/envs/XXX/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 56, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: /lib64/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.17' not found (required by XXX/anaconda3/envs/XXX/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so)

- PyTorch
- OS: CentOS release 6.7 (Final)
- PyTorch version: 3.0.1
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): conda
- Python version: 3.6
- CUDA/cuDNN version: 8.0/6.0
